About Content: The Academic Union was founded in 2007 in collaboration with scholars and graduates for the purpose of organizing a frame that supports innovative projects to raise the academic and educational level. Our main project is "The Academic and Vocational Guidance Project " The project aims to help students choose the right field of education that suits them best after they finish high school. The project achieves its’ goals through giving lectures, workshops, daily seminars, a yearly magazine, a website, a counseling line through the phone and the internet, seminars for checking educational inclinations. Finally we have established "The Golden Test" which is an online questionnaire that helps students discover the suitable career path of them.
